summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1263, for the improvement of 5th Avenue West, from Olympic Place to Kinnear Place; and Kinnear Place, from 5th Avenue West to Park Place; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks with wooden curbs, gutters and cross walks, under Ordinance No. 13886 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
